abstract: TriBeCa duplex penthouse owned by noted portrait photographer Albert Watson is on market, listed at $21.5 million; book and modern art-filled apartment with panoramic views was inspired by Pierre Chareau’s 'glass house' in Paris.

headline.main: Albert Watson’s TriBeCa Penthouse Listed at $21.5 Million

snippet: The photographer is about to place his duplex at 101 Warren Street on the market.
lead_paragraph: The photographer is about to place his duplex at 101 Warren Street on the market.
